thread.section_title: Saatchi Art Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Saatchi Art | saatchiart.com
thread.title: Mary

author: Mary
title: Mary
text:
I had been looking for art of a specific subject for the past 2 years, but online everything is so scattered. Saatchi Art is one place that you can view all types of art at your leisure. I appreciate all of the different options & filters you're given, such as, media, price, size, subject, etc.
I also had a question regarding purchasing more art from the same artist. I sent an email and received a response within 24-48 hours. I was pleased with Saatchi's professionalism and their eagerness to help.
I will use them again and recommend them to friends.
Thank you.
